name: Samsung AllShare Metadata File
summary: Learn about .MTA files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: MTA files are automatically generated by Samsung AllShare when a multimedia file is used. They are created in the same directory as each source multimedia file and use the naming convention file.avi.mta, where the source file is named file.avi.

description: File created by Samsung AllShare, a program used for sharing multimedia files between PCs, TVs, mobile phones, and other network ready DLNA devices; referred to as a "chapter" file since it contains indexing information for navigating through the multimedia files.
